content: this is a gift pattern from elissa haque from inayas toybox www inayastoybox etsy com and 1 https //www ravelry com/designers/elissa-haque heart bookmark hope you enjoy making theses bookmarks this pattern was made by elissa haque and is a gift to all of you please don t sell this pattern but feel free to sell the bookmarks you make www inayastoybox etsy com and https //www ravelry com/designers/elissa-haque this is a gift pattern from elissa haque from inayas toybox www inayastoybox etsy com and 2 https //www ravelry com/designers/elissa-haque materials abbreviations worsted weight yarn of your choice chain-chain 3 25mm hook or the smallest you are comfortable magic_ring- magic_ring with single_crochet- single_crochet large paper clip half_double_crochet- half_double_crochet tapestry needles double_crochet- double_crochet scissors treble_crochet- triple crochet increase- increase decrease- decrease slip_stitch- slip_stitch x- times blo- back loops only flo- front loops only fo- fasten_off in a magic_ring ch4 3 tc 2 double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet double_crochet ch1 slip_stitch in the double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet 2 double_crochet 3 treble_crochet ch4 slip_stitch into the magic_ring tighten fo leave a long tail for sewing work the paperclip through a st in the back of the heart i used the chain make sure you have it so that the inside of the paperclip is facing down www inayastoybox etsy com and https //www ravelry com/designers/elissa-haque this is a gift pattern from elissa haque from inayas toybox www inayastoybox etsy com and 3 https //www ravelry com/designers/elissa-haque using the tapestry needle to work the tail to the paperclip sew around the paperclip to secure it and then make a half hitch knot and hide it inside the stitches weave in the other end congratulations you have your bookmark i would love to see them tag me on social media @inayastoybox www inayastoybox etsy com and https //www ravelry com/designers/elissa-haque
